mapper.select: select lordId,nick,portrait,sex,camp,level,exp,vip,vipExp,topup,area,pos,gold,goldCost,goldGive,power,ranks,exploit,job,fight,newState,newerGift,onTime, olTime,offTime,ctTime,olAward,olMonth,silence,combatId,heroToken,mouthCardDay,mouthCLastTime,credit,refreshTime,signature,honor,goldBar, treasureWareGolden,treasureWareDust,treasureWareEssence, ancientBook from p_lord where lordId=#{lordId}
SELECT DISTINCT l.`lordId` FROM p_lord l INNER JOIN p_smallId s ON l.`lordId` != s.`lordId`

select lordId,nick,portrait,sex,camp,level,exp,vip,vipExp,topup,area,pos,gold,goldCost,goldGive,power,ranks,exploit,job,fight,newState,newerGift,onTime, olTime,offTime,ctTime,olAward,olMonth,silence,combatId,heroToken,mouthCardDay,mouthCLastTime,credit,refreshTime,signature,honor,goldBar, treasureWareGolden,treasureWareDust,treasureWareEssence, ancientBook from p_lord a WHERE a.nick is not NULL ORDER BY level DESC LIMIT #{rank}

select lordId,nick,portrait,sex,camp,level,exp,vip,vipExp,topup,area,pos,gold,goldCost,goldGive,power,ranks,exploit,job,fight,newState,newerGift,onTime, olTime,offTime,ctTime,olAward,olMonth,silence,combatId,heroToken,mouthCardDay,mouthCLastTime,credit,refreshTime,signature,honor,goldBar, treasureWareGolden,treasureWareDust,treasureWareEssence, ancientBook from p_lord where lordId in
#{lordIds}

select lordId,nick,portrait,sex,camp,level,exp,vip,vipExp,topup,area,pos,gold,goldCost,goldGive,power,ranks,exploit,job,fight,newState,newerGift,onTime, olTime,offTime,ctTime,olAward,olMonth,silence,combatId,heroToken,mouthCardDay,mouthCLastTime,credit,refreshTime,signature,honor,goldBar, treasureWareGolden,treasureWareDust,treasureWareEssence, ancientBook from p_lord where nick=#{nick}
select count(lordId) from p_lord where nick=#{nick}
mapper.update: update p_lord set nick=#{nick},portrait=#{portrait} where lordId=#{lordId}
update p_lord set vip=#{vip} where lordId=#{lordId}
update p_lord set exp=#{exp},level=#{level} where lordId=#{lordId}
update p_lord set fight=#{fight} where lordId=#{lordId}
update p_lord set newState=#{newState} where lordId=#{lordId}
mapper.select: SELECT p_lord.lordId, p_lord.nick, p_lord.portrait, p_lord.sex, p_lord.camp, p_lord.level, p_lord.exp, p_lord.vip, p_lord.vipExp, p_lord.topup, p_lord.area, p_lord.pos, p_lord.gold, p_lord.goldCost, p_lord.goldGive, p_lord.power, p_lord.ranks, p_lord.exploit, p_lord.job, p_lord.fight, p_lord.newState, p_lord.newerGift, p_lord.onTime, p_lord.olTime, p_lord.offTime, p_lord.ctTime, p_lord.olAward, p_lord.olMonth, p_lord.silence, p_lord.combatId, p_lord.heroToken, p_lord.mouthCardDay, p_lord.mouthCLastTime, p_lord.credit, p_lord.refreshTime, p_lord.signature, p_lord.honor, p_lord.goldBar, p_lord.treasureWareGolden, p_lord.treasureWareDust, p_lord.treasureWareEssence, p_lord.ancientBook FROM p_lord INNER JOIN p_account ON p_lord.lordId = p_account.lordId where p_lord.lordId > #{curIndex} order by p_lord.lordId limit 0,#{count}

SELECT pl.* FROM p_lord AS pl RIGHT JOIN p_account AS pa ON pa.lordId = pl.lordId LEFT JOIN p_smallid AS ps ON pl.lordId = ps.lordId WHERE ps.lordId IS NULL AND pl.nick IS NOT NULL AND pa.created = 1 AND camp=#{camp}
